      • integerToStringRange

        public static java.lang.String integerToStringRange(int value)
        Convert an integer to a string of its range of values If value = 5 then the String equals to "01234"
        Parameters:
        value - The maximum value starting from zero
        Returns:
        A String with all numbers to the value

        Convert a string value of intergers to an array in which each characters will be inserted

        Returns:
        An array of integers
